sections.heading: of interest in property; control of advertising outside of right-of-way; compensation; removal; costs; payment by department
sections.text: (1) The Department of Transportation may acquire the interest in real or personal property necessary to exercise the power authorized by subdivision (2)(m) of section 39-1320

sections.heading: 39-1320 to 39-1320.11 constitute a reasonable and valid exercise of the police power which bears a substantial relation to the public health, safety, and general welfare, and are constitutional
sections.text: State v. Mayhew Products Corp., 204 Neb. 266, 281 N.W.2d 783 (1979).
